TEXT: The applicant , Mr PERSON , is a NORP national who was born in DATE and lives in the town of GPE . He is represented before the ORG by Mr PERSON , a lawyer practising in GPE . ORG ( “ the Government ” ) were represented by Mr P. Laptev , Representative of GPE at ORG .
The facts of the case , as submitted by the parties , may be summarised as follows .
In DATE the applicant took part in a rescue operation on the site of the GPE nuclear disaster . As of an unspecified date the applicant has been in receipt of social benefits in this connection .

On an unspecified date the applicant brought court proceedings against the social security authority ( PERSON пенсий и пособий PERSON района г. PERSON , “ the authority ” ) for unpaid social benefits .

On DATE the ORG of the town of GPE granted the claim and ordered the authority to re - calculate the amount of the applicant ’s social benefits . It appears that the judgment indicated the specific amounts due by the authority .

Having examined the authority ’s appeal on DATE , ORG upheld the judgment of CARDINAL DATE with minor amendments . In particular , it replaced the specific amounts with a general indication that the authority ought to have re - calculated the applicant ’s social benefits using index “ CARDINAL ” .
On DATE the first instance court issued the writ of execution in respect of the judgment of CARDINAL DATE .
It appears that thereafter the applicant sent the writ to the bailiffs and on DATE they opened the enforcement proceedings .

Having received a letter from the authority confirming the compliance with the judgment , on DATE the bailiff terminated the enforcement proceedings . The letter of the authority stated that the amount due for the period between CARDINAL DATE and DATE ( CARDINAL,CARDINAL.CARDINAL RUR ) was requested from ORG , that the re - calculated DATE payment for period as of DATE was of CARDINAL ORG and that it was paid in full .

It appears that the payment allegedly due for the period from DATE to DATE was not paid to the applicant and on an unspecified date the applicant brought court proceedings against the authority in this connection . He also sought higher amount of social benefits and damages .

By judgment of DATE the ORG of the town of Izhevsk partly granted the claim and ordered the authority to pay ORG as a principal debt in respect of past payments and ORG as damages in respect of inflation losses in the applicant ’s favour . The court clarified the judgment of CARDINAL DATE and the decision of DATE , having ruled that the authority ought to have re - calculated the applicant ’s DATE payments for DATE and not from DATE as indicated by the authority earlier .
The judgment of DATE was upheld on appeal by ORG on DATE .
The Government submits that the money due pursuant to the judgment of DATE and the decision of DATE was paid to the applicant in full on CARDINAL DATE .
A special law adopted in DATE entitles the participants of the liquidation of the consequences of the GPE nuclear accident to additional social benefits , including DATE payments .

Section CARDINAL of LAW of CARDINAL DATE provides that a bailiff ’s order on the institution of enforcement proceedings must fix a time - limit for the defendant ’s voluntary compliance with a writ of execution . The time - limit may not exceed DATE . The bailiff must also warn the defendant that a coercive action will follow , should the defendant fail to comply with the time - limit .
Under LAW of the LAW , the enforcement proceedings should be completed within DATE upon receipt of the writ of enforcement by the bailiff .
